name: Recover Missing Episode Logs

on:
  workflow_dispatch:  # Manual trigger
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 0 * * 0'  # Run weekly on Sunday at midnight (optional)

jobs:
  recover-logs:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update
          sudo apt-get install -y jq curl
      
      - name: Make script executable
        run: chmod +x scripts/recover_logs.sh
      
      - name: Run recovery script
        env:
          FRMENV_FBTOKEN: ${{ secrets.TOK_FB }}
          TOK_FB: ${{ secrets.TOK_FB }}
        run: |
          bash scripts/recover_logs.sh
      
      - name: Upload recovered log as artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: recovered-log
          path: fb/recovered_log.txt
          retention-days: 30
      
      - name: Check if recovered log exists and has content
        id: check_log
        run: |
          if [ -f fb/recovered_log.txt ] && [ -s fb/recovered_log.txt ]; then
            echo "has_content=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
            echo "Recovered log has content"
            wc -l fb/recovered_log.txt
          else
            echo "has_content=false" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
            echo "No content recovered or file not found"
          fi
      
      - name: Commit and push recovered log (optional)
        if: steps.check_log.outputs.has_content == 'true'
        run: |
          git config --local user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
          git config --local user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git add fb/recovered_log.txt
          git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m "Add recovered episode logs"
          git push
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
